title: cant fighure out how many hours i have one league help pls

embed.description: Have you ever wondered how much time you spend on LoL ? An average player has spent 933 hours on League of Legends and 8.254.329 players took the test. And you ?

body: ive used this site before and its worked but now for some reason its not working anymore the only thing that i think it could be that my names all numbers cause it wasnt working for my friend who also had all numbers so if anyone could help me out with this it would be very much apreciated (and yes im searching the right server)

replies.body: It's a third party site we don't support, though it is a fun one.  We don't currently have a way to measure how much time is played, though, if it helps I usually go by how many seasons I've played.
i know its 3rd party but was wondering if anyone new why or how to fix it thanks anyway i have a aproximate amount since i checked earlier this year so its not that big of a deal
